data.name: Firefly Studio
data.detailed_description:
Firefly Studio is a Virtual YouTuber software. In addition to supporting model import and motion capture, the software also provides beautiful and powerful 3D scenes for users to use. In the 3D scene, operations such as lighting control, screen control, etc. can be performed to make your virtual image more realistic.

What can be done?
- 3D scene: Provides built-in beautiful and powerful scenes and can be manipulated, such as activity room (supports whiteboard output control, photo frame output control, lighting control, time control, etc.), stage (supports output control of both sides of the screen, multiple groups of lighting controls) Wait)
- Model import: Supports 3D (VRM) and 2D (Live2D, paid DLC) model import, and supports operations such as moving, zooming, etc.
- Facial capture: With iOS devices that support ARKit, high-precision facial motion capture is performed and presented on the model in real time

Contact us
If you have any questions or ideas in use, you can join our QQ group: 672728738 to communicate

In the 3D scene, operations such as lighting control, screen control, etc. can be performed to make your virtual image more realistic.

What can be done?

data.short_description: Firefly Studio is a Virtual YouTuber software. In addition to supporting model import and motion capture, it also provides beautiful and powerful 3D scenes. In the 3D scene, operations such as lighting control, screen control, etc. can be performed to make your virtual image more realistic.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Face capture requires iPhone or iPad.

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
